DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate whether provision free fresh fruit vegetable middle-aged men risk poverty increase fruit vegetable intake period 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: Offering Free Fruits Vegetables Men Risk Poverty
DOC.detailed_description: A total 100 men ( > 30 year , live alone ) low SES randomly assign control intervention group control food bank use . The intervention group receive free fresh fruit vegetable consist 2 daily portion favorite variety period 4 week provide per week . All participant ask fill demographic questionnaire well Food Frequency Questionnaire ( FFQ ) , questionnaire amount variety fruit vegetable consume 24-h-food-recall questionnaire . All questionnaire administer trained interviewer . During study period , 24h-food recall questionnaire administer four time ; two time 4-week intervention period two time last two week intervention period . After 4-week intervention period , interviewer administer FFQ , questionnaire amount variety , FIES . Participants assign control group receive fruit vegetable basket 4 week baseline . All participant receive gift certificate local supermarket amount 35,00 € .
DOC.criteria: income 980 € per month > 30 year age live alone without regular food delivery service ( e.g . meal wheel ) bear Germany speaks German live assist living accommodation
